reviews.review: It is a good FPS game. You have to play a lot to learn the game and be good at it!

Since playing this game I have developed a heart condition, high blood pressure, diabetes, and a multitude of mental health problems. Now, there is no proof that this is directly caused by CSGO. But, even if it was, and I could go back, I would still do it again. It's probably one of the hardest (if not the hardest) FPS games to master. If you are new, stick at it. You won't get good in 10 hours, or even 100. It takes a LOT of time to master this game. I've played Counter-Strike for over 20 years and I'm still playing it. I'm getting my ass handed to me by kids that have been alive less time than I've been playing CS. I still come back.
The new comp update works like a charm! I am no longer stuck in silver 2!
their should be a seperate HVH server for hackers
